DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : - Determine feasibility provide group support , evaluate effect supportive-expressive group therapy vs. write educational material psychological health quality life men stage I/II prostate cancer . OUTLINE : Patients stratify prior hormonal therapy . Patients continue standard oncologic treatment concurrently supportive-expressive group therapy . Supportive-expressive group therapy consist twelve 90-minute weekly meeting 8-12 member 2 cotherapists base follow theme : building bond , express emotion , detoxify dying , take time prioritize set realistic goal , fortify family , deal doctor . Each session commences brief stress reduction exercise end brief cognitive restructuring imagery exercise . The main portion meeting emphasize provide environment patient share concern , feeling , thought openly honestly . The role cotherapist facilitate expression patient ' concern , offer empathy , continue encourage patient express feeling thought . Quality-of-life questionnaire fill 3 6 month every 6 month total 2 year . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : Approximately 480 patient ( include estimate 53 minority patient ) enter multicenter study .
